title: "Neon Metropolis"
content:
# Welcome to Neon Metropolis

Neon Metropolis is a website dedicated to showcasing the latest and greatest in futuristic cityscapes. Our minimalistic graphic design and moody color scheme are designed to transport you to a world of neon lights, towering skyscrapers, and bustling streets.

We feature a curated selection of artwork from talented artists around the world, all focused on depicting the future of urban life. From sleek cyberpunk cities to sprawling metropolises, our collection has something for everyone.

Whether you're a fan of science fiction, art, or just love the aesthetic of neon lights against a dark background, Neon Metropolis is the perfect destination for you. So come explore our site and immerse yourself in the world of tomorrow!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A minimalist graphic of a futuristic cityscape, with glowing neon lights and a dark and moody color scheme."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
